short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Takes an old forum link and moves you to the correct forum topic.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to take links from Google or other resources that went to the old forum and directs you to the actual topic in the archives.
